Text:

it's a cd rip. i'm going to do the vinyl when i get it ;)

Whoa. Good work getting your hands on it. Thanks for the FLAC+320 upload. I Pre-ordered the album on iTunes but I wanted a HQ rip quickly so I'm going to use your release for my car, and iTunes download for my iPod :D

Anyway thanks

About time someone brought this across from the private sites.. i had to check the .log and had a giggle...
Good Job! :))

Has anyone figured out who the female vocalist on "Almost Famous" is? Sounds like Katy Perry..Anyway, this flac release is pretty amazing. Listening through it all, sounds really good. Still seeding it too =]
it's the lead singer of "The Knife", can't remember her name
yea but as a huge eminem fan. i researve the right to title it as i see fit. ;)

the 17th song does not actually exist on the Cover so as HMV states, (Bonus Track) with the song name.. 
Untitled just means it ain't there! But it is on the CD!!!!! :))

@omgmusti and HMVinyl, Liz Rodrigues is the female voice credited for additional vocals on Almost Famous (see: Recovery digital booklet). I don't see The Knife's Karin Dreijer Andersson credited anywhere on the album. Just FTR =]
lol my bad.. i got my info from a forum board

lol no, i go by HMVinyl or HomeMadeVinyl or HMV and nothing else that matters to you ;)
